page.title: 04INDUSTRY IN DURSLEY
page.content: The electrical engineering firm of Mawdsleys Ltd has been operating in its factory on the outskirts of Dursley since the beginning of the century .It makes electric generators and motors and its market is world- wide . The factory covers an area of a little more than one hectare. Mawdsleys is the second largest employer in the district. The factory site also houses two very much smaller industries. The firm of Pro-Quip produces sports wear and is a thriving small company employing 33 people. Their products include golfing suits, casual jackets and sweaters and water-proof clothing. The Disposal and Packaging supplies company of Gerry Dance was started in 1976 and employs five people.
